00031 function databaseLoadModule ($module) {
00032         if (databaseModuleExists ($module)) {
00033                 $allModules = databaseGetAllModules ();
00034                 $dbClass = new $allModules[$module] ();
00035                 return $dbClass;
00036         } else {
00037                 return "ERROR_DATABASEMANAGER_MODULE_DOES_NOT_EXITS $module";
00038         }
00039 }
00040 
00048 function databaseGetAllModules ($checkReqs = false) {
00049         global $allModules, $availableModules;
00050         $allModules = array ();
00051         $availableModules = array ();
00052         foreach (scandir ('core/databases') as $file) {
00053                 if (is_file ('core/databases/'.$file)) {
00054                         include ('core/databases/'.$file);
00055                 }
00056         }
00057         
00058         if ($checkReqs) {
00059                 return $availableModules;
00060         } else {
00061                 return $allModules;
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00072 function databaseModuleExists ($module, $checkReqs = false) {
00073         if (array_key_exists ($module, databaseGetAllModules ($checkReqs))) {
00074                 return true;
00075         } else {
00076                 return false;
00077         }
00078 }
00079 
00080 function databaseInstallModule () {
00081 }
00082 
00083 function databaseUnInstallModule () {
00084 }

00086 class databaseActions {
00087 
00088         var $prefix;
00089         var $type;
00090         
00091         function setPrefix ($prefix) {
00092                 $this->prefix = $prefix;
00093         }
00094 
00095         function getPrefix () {return $this->prefix;}
00096         
00097         function setType ($type) {
00098                 $this->type = $type;
00099         }
00100         
00101         function getType () {return $this->type;}
00102 }
